Name: South of Heaven
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest & mint sprigs.
Express lemon zest twist over cocktail and discard. Garnish with mint sprigs bouquet.
Review: Bittersweet and refreshing with the very distinctive flavours of mastiha and Fernet Branca.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2013 by George Megalokonomos at Food Mafia, Athens, Greece. This was the winning cocktail in the Mediterranean Cocktails Challenge 2013.
Nutrition: One serving of South of Heaven contains 167 calories
